summary: Build a modern, clean, professional technology-focused guest post/blog platform site named Zeekly, featuring high-quality tech content and a structured blog layout with a post-hero CTA button.
architectural_notes: Site name: Zeekly; purpose: technology-focused guest post/blog platform.
Visual style: modern, clean, professional; strong tech-oriented identity; minimal layout; clear typography; structured blog format.
CTA requirement: after hero section, prominent button text “Lifestyle” linking to https://zeekly.co.uk/; opens in same tab; visually noticeable but clean and non-ad-like.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Zeekly wordmark logo in a modern tech style (zeekly-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
- Abstract minimal tech hero background/illustration (zeekly-hero-bg.dim_2400x1200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a modern, clean, professional landing page for “Zeekly” with a strong tech-oriented visual identity, using a minimal layout, clear typography, and a structured blog format suitable for a technology-focused guest post platform.

Add a prominent call-to-action button immediately after the hero section with the label “Lifestyle” that links to https://zeekly.co.uk/ and opens in the same tab; the button must feel native to the site design (not ad-like) while remaining visually noticeable, clean, and professional.

Implement core blog navigation and pages for a structured publishing experience: a posts listing view and a post detail view, pre-populated with sample content covering tech articles, digital innovation, software guides, startup insights, and trending technology news.

Add a minimal backend content API for posts so the frontend can fetch post lists and individual post details from the Internet Computer canister (single Motoko actor), using a simple data model suitable for blog publishing.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) appropriate for a modern technology publication and enforce it consistently across Zeekly pages and components.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Zeekly website as a technology-focused guest post platform with a structured blog format (tech articles, innovation, software guides, startup insights, tech news).
Design UI with modern, clean, professional tech-oriented visual identity: minimal layout, clear typography, structured blog layout suitable for guest posting.

Add a prominent post-hero call-to-action button labeled “Lifestyle” linking to https://zeekly.co.uk/ (opens in same tab) and styled naturally within the modern tech design (not like an advertisement).
